note.p: Daughter of Henry Johnson, physician. Lived in Shrewsbury with her father. In Burnham, Somerset, with her father, 1881; in Alrewas, Staffordshire, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales, 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2772/25/3), 1881 (RG11/2417/102/29), 1891 (RG12/2216/101/29)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 December 2018)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 22 October 2019)
